content.prompt: The French Fronde is best described as the

choices.label: first government formed after the French Revolution
civil war fought between Roman Catholics and Protestants
revolt over increasing centralization of royal power
wars between France and the Holy Roman Empire
style of architecture developed under Louis XIV

topic.text: 3.8: Comparison in the Age of Absolutism and Constitutionalism

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
